rules.title: Good to Moderate Air Quality
rules.message: Air quality changed to {aqi_level} (AQI: {aqi}, PM2.5: {pm2_5} μg/m³)

rules.title: Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups
rules.message: Air quality is {aqi_level} (AQI: {aqi}, PM2.5: {pm2_5} μg/m³). Sensitive individuals should limit prolonged outdoor exertion.

rules.title: Unhealthy Air Quality
rules.message: Air quality is {aqi_level} (AQI: {aqi}, PM2.5: {pm2_5} μg/m³). Everyone should reduce prolonged outdoor exertion.

rules.title: Very Unhealthy to Hazardous Air Quality
rules.message: EMERGENCY: Air quality is {aqi_level} (AQI: {aqi}, PM2.5: {pm2_5} μg/m³). Avoid all outdoor activities. Close windows and use air purifiers.

rules.title: High PM2.5 Concentration
rules.message: High PM2.5 detected: {pm2_5} μg/m³ (AQI: {aqi}). Check for local pollution sources.

rules.title: Elevated CPU Temperature
rules.message: CPU temperature is elevated: {cpu_temp}°C. Monitor for overheating.

rules.title: High CPU Temperature
rules.message: CPU temperature is high: {cpu_temp}°C. Check cooling and ventilation.

rules.title: Critical CPU Temperature
rules.message: CRITICAL: CPU temperature is {cpu_temp}°C. System may throttle or shut down. Immediate action required.

rules.title: High CPU Usage
rules.message: High CPU usage detected: {cpu_usage}%. System may be under heavy load.

rules.title: High Memory Usage
rules.message: High memory usage detected: {memory_usage}%. System may need more RAM or memory cleanup.

rules.title: High Disk Usage
rules.message: Disk usage is high: {disk_usage}%. Consider cleaning up old files or expanding storage.

rules.title: Air Quality Sensor Failure
rules.message: The PMS7003 air quality sensor has failed or is not responding. Check connections and power supply.

rules.title: Stale Air Quality Data
rules.message: Air quality data is stale (last update: {age_minutes} minutes ago). Check sensor connectivity and service status.
